name: Enzo - Chinchilla Time Traveler
description:
Enzo - Chinchilla Time Traveler Description

Help Enzo the Chinchilla use her Time Machine Ball to roll her way back home.

Enzo can travel forward and backward in time to flip switches and unlock gates to reach the end of each puzzle. Just don't run into anything or your time machine might explode.

Submitted for GMTK Game Jam 2021 - Exploring how we are connected to ourselves thru time ... especially if we are a time travelling chinchilla.

Note: A fully working game mode wasn't complete in time for the game jam. Enjoy exploring the  map editor. Much more to be added in the near future.

Map Edit Mode
  • Left click (or drag) to add maze sections.
  • Right click to delete a section
  • Mouse scroll wheel to zoom in/out
  • Press H to reset view to center
  • CTRL + Left click to add Enzo to the map to start Game mode
Game Mode
  • Press R to remember a moment in time
  • Press T to travel back to the last time remembered
  • Press + / - to speed up or slow down time and 0 to reset to 1x 
  • Press ESC key to pause the game
  • Press Spacebar to toggle follow mode
